notes:
[Fathom Feeder] is a borderline money pick. While it's pretty good in the UB Injest deck, getting passed [Mist Intruders] and {Benthic Infiltrators] is what's going to pull me into that deck.

[Retreat to Emeria] might be the best white uncommon. It provides a continuous stream of allies, which huge in any of the ally-based decks.
